channel.title: Pasión de las Pasiones One-Shot
channel.description:
We have one seat left in our GCOG one-shot of *Pasión de las Pasiones: The Fire Never Fades* for next Saturday at 7PM US Eastern.
It's free!
This session will be played using Safety tools-- anyone can sign up. It's super fun. I'm running https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MklP3OfUepNhJNvL0ie
